content.rendered:
A great protein pick-me-up!!

What you will need:

-1 Cup of cooked and drained black beans

-1/2 cup of diced peppers

-1/2 cup of diced tomatoes

-Olive Oil

-Lemon

-Salt

-Pepper

-Optional: Avocado

Mix beans peppers and tomatoes.

In another small bowl mix olive oil, a few squeezes of lemon juice, and salt and pepper.

Combine and stir.

In another small bowl mix olive oil, a few squeezes of lemon juice, and salt and pepper. […]
